article_text: SALEM, Ore. AP—Oregon Gov. Vic Atiyeh said Thursday he would oppose any effoils to divert Columbia River water to Nevada for the proposed MX missile project. 1 don’t want to be dramatic about this,’’ he said. I’m absolutely adamant that nobody’s going to get Columbia River water.”	,: Atiyeh said there is no water to spare ifrom the river, which serves Oregon, Washington and Idaho. He said if Nevada officials demanded Sacramento River water, they would get the same reaction from California officials.
